title: Shock-A-Bye Baby (Novel)
description:
Description :
        Huido hasn't seen his father since he was a little kid. One day, Woorak, a debt collector, pays Huido a visit, claiming that Huido's father disappeared after taking out a huge loan. Huido, who has an irrational fear of middle-aged men, was left with no choice but to tase Woorak and lock the man up in the basement. But Huido's heart starts beating fast... could this be love?As Huido finds himself smitten with Woorak, he does his best to seduce the man. However, the mister seems just as strange as he is! The story continues to tell a shocking tale of love that dips between common and uncommon sense.Official English
